did.abstract: Publications of the Ann Arbor Planning Commission including annual reports, capital improvement budgets, and planning studies and reports.

repository.corpname: Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

acqinfo.p: The Planning Commission publications have been received in multiple accessions from several donors.

accessrestrict.p: The record group is open without restriction.

userestrict.p: Copyright is held by the creating agency.

prefercite.p: [item], folder, box, Ann Arbor Planning Commission publications, Bentley Historical Library, University of Michigan

bioghist.p: The Ann Arbor Planning Commission is a unit of Ann Arbor city government.

scopecontent.p: Publications of the Ann Arbor Planning Commission, ca. 1961-1997, including annual reports, capital improvement budgets, and planning studies and reports.
